title: For us, sustainable digital change means implementing open government under the following guidelines:
txt:
Open Data: Publish administrative data in a machine-readable and standardised form.

                Civic Tech: Aligning technology with human needs.

                Public Money, Public Good: Invest taxpayers' money in free and open-source software.

                Digital volunteerism: Involve and promote civil society.

                Ecological sustainability: Protect natural resources.
